name: Enrich license plate information
description: Flow to enrich APNR events of license plates with information from Amazon DynamoDB

cloudstream.name: Amazon DynamoDB
cloudstream.description: Amazon DynamoDB allows you to create a database table that can store and retrieve any amount of data, and serve any level of request traffic using the REST interface.

handlers.label: Cumulocity trigger Event
handlers.title: Cumulocity
handlers.input: {"type":"object","title":"Select Trigger","properties":{"auth":{"type":"string","title":"Connect to Cumulocity","minLength":1,"connection":"com.softwareag.cloudstreams.cumulocity_v0.9-sagcloud","propertyOrder":1},"deviceId":{"type":"string","title":" Device ID","minLength":1,"description":"Enter the device ID for which you want to set the trigger. A device ID can be the MAC address of the network adapter, the IMEI of a mobile device, or a hardware serial number. E.g., 2480300 or * for all devices"},"customFilters":{"type":"array","title":"Custom Filters","items":{"type":"object","title":"filter","properties":{"input":{"type":"string","title":"Input","minLength":1},"operator":{"type":"string","title":"Condition","enum":["Equals","Equals(Number)","GreaterThan","LessThan","Contains","DoesNotContains","ObjectHasKey","matches","isNull","isEmpty","isNumber","isObject","isArray","isBoolean","isDate","isUndefined"]},"expected":{"type":"string","title":"Expected","minLength":1}}}}},"oneOf":[{"type":"object","title":"Alarm","properties":{"event":{"type":"string","enum":["Alarm"],"options":{"hidden":true}},"event_type":{"minLenght":1,"type":"string","title":"Event Type","description":"Select the type of the event for which you want to set the trigger","enum":["Alarm"],"options":{"hidden":true}}}},{"type":"object","title":"Event","properties":{"event":{"type":"string","enum":["Event"],"options":{"hidden":true}},"event_type":{"minLenght":1,"type":"string","title":"Event Type","description":"Select the type of the event for which you want to set the trigger","enum":["Event"],"options":{"hidden":true}}}},{"type":"object","title":"Measurement","properties":{"event":{"type":"string","enum":["Measurement"],"options":{"hidden":true}},"event_type":{"minLenght":1,"type":"string","title":"Event Type","description":"Select the type of the event for which you want to set the trigger","enum":["Measurement"],"options":{"hidden":true}}}},{"type":"object","title":"Inventory","properties":{"event":{"type":"string","enum":["Inventory"],"options":{"hidden":true}},"event_type":{"minLenght":1,"type":"string","title":"Inventory","description":"Enter the managedObjectId","enum":["Inventory"],"options":{"hidden":true}}}}]}

action_schema.json: {"title":"Condition Activity","description":"Only flow continue when","type":"object","properties":{"or":{"type":"array","title":"Conditions","items":{"type":"object","title":"Condition","properties":{"and":{"type":"array","title":"Filters","items":{"type":"object","title":"Filter","format":"table","properties":{"input":{"type":"string","title":"Input","minLength":1},"operator":{"title":"Condition","description":"Select proper condition","type":"string","enum":["(Text) Matches","(Text) Exactly Matches","(Text) Does Not Match","(Text) Does Not Exactly Match","(Text) Contains","(Text) Does Not Contain","(Text) Starts With","(Text) Does Not Start With","(Text) Ends With","(Text) Does Not End With","(Text) Is Alphanumeric","(Text) Is Empty","(Number) Equals","(Number) Not Equals","(Number) Greater Than","(Number) Greater Than Equals","(Number) Less Than","(Number) Less Than Equals","(Number) Is Negative","(Number) Is Positive","(Date/Time) Equals","(Date/Time) Less Than","(Date/Time) Less Than Equals","(Date/Time) Greater Than","(Date/Time) Greater Than Equals","(Array) Length Equals","(Array) Length Does Not Equals","(Array) Length Less Than","(Array) Length Less Than Equals","(Array) Length Greater Than","(Array) Length Greater Than Equals","(Array) Is Empty","(Array) Contains All Object","(Array) Contains All String","(Array) Contains All Number","(Array) Contains All Object And Has This Property","(Object) Has Property","(Object) Does Not Have Property","(Object) Is Empty","(Regex) Match Pattern","(Boolean) Is Value True","(Boolean) Is Value False","(Input) Exists","(Input) Does Not Exist","(Input) Is Null","(Input) Is String","(Input) Is Number","(Input) Is Date","(Input) Is An Array","(Input) Is An Object","(Input) Is Boolean","(Input) Data Type Is"]},"expected":{"type":"string","title":"Expected","description":"Enter the value you want to compare against the value given in the Input field for the specified condition. Param","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"title":"Key"},"value":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"title":"Value"}}}},"gzip":{"type":"boolean","title":"Decode Gzip
